00007 /* INPUT CAPTURE CAP0.0 on P0.22*/
00008 #define TACHO_MB_PINSEL     PINSEL1
00009 #define TACHO_MB_PINSEL_VAL 0x02
00010 #define TACHO_MB_PINSEL_BIT 12
00011 
00012 void tacho_mb_init ( void ) {
00013   /* select pin for capture */
00014   TACHO_MB_PINSEL |= TACHO_MB_PINSEL_VAL << TACHO_MB_PINSEL_BIT;
00015   /* enable capture 0.2 on falling edge + trigger interrupt */
00016   T0CCR |= TCCR_CR0_F | TCCR_CR0_I;
00017 }
